CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName="DPD_BNL_Anomalie_Synchro", RecordType.DeveloperName="DPD_HUN_Anomalie_Synchro"), Indisponibilite_en_cours__c="0", Etat_Pudo__c<>"7", Etat_Pudo__c<>"8", Etat_Pudo__c<>"9", OR(ISBLANK(Date_de_rappel_planifiee__c), Date_de_rappel_planifiee__c<=Today())
), true, false)
CustomField.label: Conditions AnoSynch
